briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of AL-4943A Ophthalmic Solution in Patients With Allergic Conjunctivitis Using the Conjunctival Allergen Challenge (CAC) Model
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Masked, Vehicle and Active Controlled, Parallel-Group Efficacy and Safety Study of AL-4943A Ophthalmic Solution, 0.77% in Patients With Allergic Conjunctivitis Using the Conjunctival Allergen Challenge (CAC) Model
summary: The purpose of this study was to assess the safety and efficacy of AL-4943A ophthalmic solution for the treatment of ocular itching associated with allergic conjunctivitis using the Conjunctival Allergen Challenge (CAC) model.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Ocular Itching at Onset of Action
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 3, 5, and 7 minute timepoints, post-CAC on Day 21 of receiving treatment
